case.title: 32 Year Old English Girl looking for a special someone - 32
case.text:
Hi There
My name is Laura I am a 32 year old English woman who is looking for a special someone in my life.
I am 5ft7,long brown hair,green/grey eyes a curvy size 16/18
Looking for a English male between the ages of 25 - 33
please note I am looking for someone GENUINE,WITH A KIND HEART WHO I CAN GET TO KNOW AND PLEASE GUYS NO SEX INTENTIONS I AM IN NO RUSH FOR THINGS LIKE THAT
Anyway I hope my Mr right is out there somewhere
